Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.recorder

Class Recorder

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.recorder.Recorder
public class Recorder extends Object
Recorder class used for saving current game, loading and running through past saved games.
Author:
Ethan Windle

  • Field Details

    • auto

      public static boolean auto
      auto is used to inform game that it should be automatically running through the loaded game. playbackSpeed is used to determine how fat it should automatically play through a loaded game.

    • playbackSpeed

      public static int playbackSpeed

  • Method Details

    • SaveGame

      public static void SaveGame(Maze maze, File file)
      Save the current game in an xml file that the player chooses/create.
      Parameters:
      maze - the current games maze.
      file - the file the game will be saved to.

    • LoadSave

      public static Maze LoadSave(File file) throws org.jdom2.JDOMException, IOException
      Loads a saved game chosen by the player.
      Parameters:
      file - the saved game the player chooses to load.
      Returns:
      returns the maze of the saved level.
      Throws:
      org.jdom2.JDOMException - handles the xml reading errors.
      IOException - handles any file errors.

    • Next

      public static void Next(Maze m)
      Runs all characters next move if chap still has some else turn off auto replay.
      Parameters:
      m - passes through the current maze.

    • nextMove

      public static void nextMove(Maze m)
      Makes sure auto play is off and manual run the next move.
      Parameters:
      m - passes through the current maze.

    • AutoPlay

      public static void AutoPlay()
      Inverse the auto boolean allowing the player to pause/play the auto play of their loaded game.
